snippet: Don Nash, a 23-year veteran at the show, replaces Jim Bell and will report to Alexandra Wallace, who will be the new executive in charge of "Today."
abstract: Don Nash, a 23-year veteran at the show, replaces Jim Bell and will report to Alexandra Wallace, who will be the new executive in charge of "Today."

headline.main: In Shift in 'Today' Oversight, NBC Names New Executives
headline.print_headline: In Shift in ‘Today’ Oversight, NBC Names New Executives
